definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: swim (NH [[סָחוּ]] swimming; Targam [[סְחָא]], Syr. sh.o0 swim, bathe, also [[סָחְיָא]], [[סַחְיׇנׇא]], [[שָׂחְיׇנׇא]] swimmer; Aph. wash);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. + Inf. cstr. [[יְפָרֵשׂ הַשּׂחֶה לִשְׂחוֹת]] Is 25:11.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. 1 S. [[אַשְׂחֶה]] Ps 6:7 I make my bed swim (with my tears; another view sub [[שִׂיחַ]]
